directions: Whisk the ketchup, chili sauce, horseradish, brown sugar, lemon juice, hot sauce, garlic salt, and onion powder together in a bowl until the sugar has dissolved; cover. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup tomato-based chili sauce (such as Heinz®)
1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
title: Perfect Cocktail Sauce
